en-US.description:
"A pioneer of the new-age travel culture in India, Zostel is also the world's largest backpacker hostel chain. Stay with us at 60+ destinations across India and Nepal, exploring remote locations, remote parts of popular locations, and unconventional experiences on your holiday. Our range of accommodation includes social backpacker Zostel hostels, cultural and private Zostel Homes, and luxurious Zostel Plus stays.

*Forget pretentious accommodation*
Zostel makes you curve away from monotonous holiday accommodation and enjoy a happening stay with like-minded travellers. Common rooms are the beating heart of all Zostel properties, where travellers socialise, play games, indulge in activities, and make memories. The Zostel vibe is apt for solo travellers, small group of friends, and couples alike.

*Explore the finest of India*
Zostel properties are located in exemplary locations to provide you with the finest experience of any destination. From the remote glacier lands of Himachal to unmapped Keralan villages, we believe in exploring and making a home out of unconventional, surprising, and truly remarkable destinations.

*Experiences like no others*
We believe in experiencing every destination like a local. At every Zostel property, you will find a list of curated, special experiences that you can DIY or join us for. From nature trails that lead to hidden waterfalls, cafe crawls, and adventure sports to farming, stargazing, and learning local art forms, there is something in store for every Zosteler."
en-US.title: Zostel
en-US.subtitle: Explore with unique stays
